SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
An action that can be executed.
AnimatedSprite
Animated sprite, renders the frame depending on the time of requesting the draw.
Blinky
An implementation of the classic Pac-Man ghost Shadow.
Board
A top-down view of a matrix of Squares.
BoardFactory
A factory that creates Board objects from 2-dimensional arrays of Squares.
Clyde
An implementation of the classic Pac-Man ghost Clyde.
CollisionInteractionMap
A map of possible collisions and their handlers.
CollisionInteractionMap.CollisionHandler<C1,C2>
Handles the collision between two colliding parties.
CollisionMap
A table containing all (relevant) collisions between different types of units.
DefaultPlayerInteractionMap
An extensible default interaction map for collisions caused by the player.
Direction
An enumeration of possible directions on a two-dimensional square grid.
EmptySprite
Empty Sprite which does not contain any data.
Game
A basic implementation of a Pac-Man game.
GameFactory
Factory that provides Game objects.
Ghost
A non-player unit.
GhostColor
A list of supported ghost colors.
GhostFactory
Factory that creates ghosts.
ImageSprite
Basic implementation of a Sprite, it merely consists of a static image.
Inky
An implementation of the classic Pac-Man ghost Inky.
Launcher
Creates and launches the JPacMan UI.
Level
A level of Pac-Man.
Level.LevelObserver
An observer that will be notified when the level is won or lost.
LevelFactory
Factory that creates levels and units.
MapParser
Creates new Levels from text representations.
Navigation
Navigation provides utility to navigate on Squares.
PacmanConfigurationException
Exception that is thrown when JPacman cannot be properly loaded from its resources.
PacManSprites
Sprite Store containing the classic Pac-Man sprites.
PacManUI
The default JPacMan UI frame.
PacManUiBuilder
Builder for the JPac-Man UI.
Pellet
A pellet, one of the little dots Pac-Man has to collect.
Pinky
An implementation of the classic Pac-Man ghost Speedy.
Player
A player operated unit in our game.
PlayerCollisions
A simple implementation of a collision map for the JPacman player.
PlayerFactory
Factory that creates Players.
ScorePanel
A panel consisting of a column for each player, with the numbered players on top and their respective scores underneath.
ScorePanel.ScoreFormatter
Provide means to format the score for a given player.
SinglePlayerGame
A game with one player and a single level.
Sprite
Visual representation of some object.
SpriteStore
Utility to load Sprites.
Square
A square on a Board, which can (or cannot, depending on the type) be occupied by units.
Unit
A unit that can be placed on a Square.
